#include<iostream>

#define loop(x1,x2)  for(i=x1-1;i<=x2-1;i++)

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   int m,n,t=1,i,count,x1,x2,y1,y2,j;
   cin>>m>>n;

   int mat[m][n];

   loop(t,m)
   for(j=0;j<n;j++)
   cin>>mat[i][j];

   cin>>t;

   while(t--)
   {

     cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;

     count=0;

     loop(x1,x2)
     for(j=y1-1;j<y2;j++)
     count=count+mat[i][j];

     cout<<count<<endl;

   }

   return 0;

}
